snippet.title: Open homes: Our weekend property planner to suit any budget and lifestyle - realestate.com.au
snippet.content:
1 PINDA ST, EDEN HILLS
ARE you looking to enter the property market or perhaps you're chasing your next investment? Heres a taste of some of the diverse housing options featuring in this weekend's open inspections. BARGAIN HUNTER
27 St Germain Ave, Andrews Farm
3 BED, 2 BATH, 2 CAR PRICE: $299,000-$328,000 AGENT: Mike Lao, ph 0410 390 250, Matt Ashford, ph 0487 888 178, of Ray White Salisbury OPEN: Saturday, 12.05pm-12.25pm LOCATED on a quiet street, this three bedroom home would be ideal for investors with the property currently tenanted at $246 per week on a periodic lease. Built in 2010, the home features a formal lounge area, modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances and gas cooktop, a master bedroom with ensuite and walk-in-robe and a low maintenance, fully-fenced backyard. MID-RANGE
16 Modra Circuit, Hillbank
4 BED, 2 BATH, 4 CAR PRICE: $539,000 - $579,000 AGENT: Chris Janzon, ph 0423 283 265, Ben Gow, ph 0490 532 738, of Harcourts Sergeant OPEN: Saturday, 3pm-3.30pm SITUATED on a 1071sqm corner allotment with a triple driveway and an abundance of parking and garage room, this home is all about space and conceniance. Inside, the spacious home features a large formal lounge and dining ara, open plan kitchen, four bedrooms - including a master with walk-in-robe and ensuite. There is also 3.4KW solar panels and a large outdoor entertaining area and patio. HIGH END
1 Pinda St, Eden Hills
4 BED, 2 BATH PRICE: $1.18 million AGENT: Sarah Jaensch, ph 0408 285 485, of Toop & Toop Real Estate OPEN: Saturday, 11am-11.30am THIS magnificent and impressive four bedroom home is situated on over half an acre (2311sqm). Original period charm and character feature prominently throughout with polished floorboards, bay windows, fireplaces, high ceilings, tessellated veranda tiles, Victorian Cove cornices, fret work, cellar and generously proportioned rooms. Living features include two living rooms, four bedrooms, two bathrooms and a spacious kitchen. SEASIDE ESCAPE
5a Marine Ave, Hallett Cove
4 BED, 3 BATH, 2 CAR PRICE: $660,000-$695,000 AGENT: Simon Noakes, ph 0402 211 543, Callan Eames, ph 0431 471 470, of Harris Real Easte OPEN: 1.45pm-2.15pm LOCATED only a short walk to the beach and the popular Hallett Cove boardwalk, this four-bedroom family home is a great investment for those chasing the seaside lifestyle. It features four generous sized bedrooms, two separate living areas, a gourmet kitchen, three bathrooms, an undercover paved terrace. There is also a balcony off the main living area with ocean views and secure double parking. HILLSIDE LIVING
303a Checker Gill Rd, Kersbrook
5 BED, 2 BATH, 5 CAR PRICE: $980,000 AGENT: Mike Buss, ph 0409 107 337, of LJ Hooker Craigmore, OPEN: Sunday, 11.30am-12.15pm ONLY five-years old, this five bedroom home offers the best of family living in the Adelaide Hills. It contains a children's retreat along with a theatre room and a shared living, dining and kitchen area which leads out to a large entertainers deck. The upstairs master bedroom takes advantage of all the valley views and has its own private bathroom with a spa and spacious walk through robe. The home also comes with secure parking, 10kw solar panels, a 12x5m solar heated pool, enviro cycle septic system, and a 132,000- litre rainwater tank. All this is on low maintenance 27.41ha of land.
